pages.text: $(bold)Help! There are so many dragons underground!$()$(br2)Yes, I know there are $(italic)quite$() a few dragons underground. This is, in fact, intentional. It is part of the lore that I have yet to finish.$(br2)If you are not fond of this many dragons, you are more than welcome to edit the config yourself.

How to locate the config:$(br2)$(bold)BaerCraft / configs / iceandfire-common.toml$()$(br2)On line 40, thereâ€™s the option to change how frequent dragon caves generate. The $(bold)lower the number$(), the $(bold)more common$() they are.
